Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Production

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Production
public class Production
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents a container that holds information about one single production that a player decides to activate during his turn. It has an input, an output and a boolean flag that is set to 'true' when the Production gets selected by the ProductionHandler

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Production()
    Default constructor builds default Production (2 ResourceJolly in input and 1 ResourceJolly in output) with id 0

      public Production()
      Default constructor builds default Production (2 ResourceJolly in input and 1 ResourceJolly in output) with id 0

    • Production

      public Production​(int id, java.util.List<Resource> input, java.util.List<Resource> output)
      Constructor
      Parameters:
      id - the production's card's id
      input - specifies the Resources used to produce the output
      output - specifies the Resources obtained by executing this Production

    • isSelectedByHandler

      public boolean isSelectedByHandler()
      Getter
      Returns:
      returns true if the Production has been selected by the ProductionHandler to be executed at the end of the turn

    • equals

      public boolean equals​(java.lang.Object obj)
      Equals controls only if the input and output lists are equals. This means that 2 Productions with different IDs but the same input/output will be considered equal
      Overrides:
      equals in class java.lang.Object
      Parameters:
      obj - object to compare
      Returns:
      true only if the 2 Productions input and output lists are equal
